game.name: Cyber Saber PRO
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Become HKKMR-U, the legendary Cyborg Samurai, and test your reflexes in a fast-paced arcade hack-and-slash survival game. Stand your ground, unleash your sword skills, and face wave after wave of mechanical enemies inspired by Japanese folklore.
